reference.text: manifolding devices or office printing machines B41L

note.note-paragraph: Attention is drawn to Notes 1 and 2 following the title of subclass B41L.
In this subclass non-limiting references (in the sense of paragraph 39 of the Guide to the IPC) may still be displayed in the scheme.

title-part.text: Platen presses, i.e. presses in which printing is effected by at least one essentially-flat pressure-applying member co-operating with a flat type-bed
for mono-impression printing, e.g. on sheets
with platen maintained parallel to bed during movement
for multi-impression printing in one or more colours, e.g. on webs
using swinging platens, or forme supports
for perfecting sheets, i.e. for printing on both sides of sheets
specially adapted for printing heads, e.g. letter heads
Clamps for conveying sheets and for holding same on the platens
using flat inking elements, e.g. discs
pivoting around the platen or base
supported on carriages for movement in or on runways
Arrangements of counting devices for counting sheets
to the hands of the operator
Cylinder presses, i.e. presses essentially comprising at least one cylinder co-operating with at least one flat type-bed
with impression cylinder or cylinders rotating unidirectionally
Twin presses, i.e. with more than one cylinder or type-bed
with impression cylinder or cylinders rotating in opposite directions during each working cycle
Twin presses, i.e. with more than one cylinder or type-bed
of special construction or for particular purposes
with fixed type-beds and travelling impression cylinders
with cylinders travelling around type-beds having upper and lower printing surfaces
with type-beds and impression cylinders simultaneously movable relative to one another
Proof-print presses for relief printing, lithography or intaglio printing, i.e. presses for checking accuracy of printing surfaces
for perfecting sheets, i.e. for printing on both sides thereof
for monocolour or multicolour printing on one side of webs, or for perfecting webs, i.e. monocolour or multicolour printing on both sides of webs
Apparatus for cooling, heating, or drying printing surfaces
Devices for adjusting cylinders relative to type-beds and setting in adjusted position
Applications of linkwork or gearing for producing reciprocatory or angular motion
Applications of braking devices or of devices for stopping type-bed in registered position
with several printing units in sequential arrangement
with several printing units in both superimposed and sequential arrangement
with several printing units arranged side by side
for printing on one side and on the other side of webs between the same forme and impression cylinders
with several impression cylinders arranged around a forme cylinder
using one impression cylinder co-operating with several forme cylinders

CPC-specific-text.text: Multicolour printing or perfecting on sheets or on one or more webs, in one printing unit

title-part.text: using printing units incorporating one forme cylinder, one transfer cylinder, and one impression cylinder, e.g. for printing on webs
using one transfer cylinder co-operating with several forme cylinders for printing on sheets or webs, e.g. sampling of colours on one transfer cylinder
using one impression cylinder co-operating with several transfer cylinders for printing on sheets or webs, e.g. satellite-printing units
using two cylinders one of which serves two functions, e.g. as a transfer and impression cylinder in perfecting machines
with two or more impression cylinders coacting with a single transfer cylinder
for printing on more than one web simultaneously
for printing on non-deformable material, e.g. sheet metal

CPC-specific-text.text: for damping from the inside of the cylinders

title-part.text: Ducts, containers, or like supply devices for liquids
Inking-rollers serving also to apply ink repellent
with supercooling for condensation of air moisture
Devices for tripping or lifting damping rollers
Supporting, adjusting, or removing arrangements therefor

reference.text: such arrangements or devices for inking rollers B41F31/30

CPC-specific-text.text: Printing two webs with the same printing cylinder
Printing on two sides of the same web
Means for preventing egress of vapours
End seals between cylinder and housing

title-part.text: Continuous flexible surfaces, e.g. endless bands
Removing or recovering ink from wiping mechanisms
Auxiliary devices for exchanging forme cylinders
Rotary presses or machines having forme cylinders carrying a plurality of printing surfaces, or for performing letterpress, lithographic, or intaglio processes selectively or in combination
Common details of rotary presses or machines
Electric or hydraulic features of drives
Mechanical features of drives, e.g. gears, clutches

reference.text: devices for taking-up backlash in general F16H55/00, e.g. F16H55/18

title-part.text: Conveying or guiding webs through presses or machines

CPC-specific-text.text: with means for preventing or damping vibrations or shocks

title-part.text: with means for displacing the cylinders
with means for displacing the printing formes on the cylinders
Supports for bearings or supports for forme, offset, or impression cylinders
Means for cooling or heating forme or impression cylinders
Bearings mounted eccentrically of the cylinder axis
Cams, eccentrics, wedges, or the like
Guards or covers, e.g. for preventing ingress or egress of foreign matter
Arrangements to accommodate interchangeable cylinders of different sizes to enable machine to print on areas of different sizes
Printing units for inserting latest news
Arrangements to enable printing to be effected over selected areas of a single forme cylinder
by effecting relative movement of forme and impression cylinders during printing cycle
by projecting and retracting parts of the surface of the forme cylinder
Auxiliary folding, cutting, collecting or depositing of sheets or webs

reference.text: gathering sheets or signatures in bookbinding B42C1/00

title-part.text: with auxiliary equipment, e.g. for drying printed articles

CPC-specific-text.text: with a stationary screen and a moving squeegee
with a stationary squeegee and a moving screen
by means of cylindrical screens or screens in the form of endless belts
with a stationary screen and a moving squeegee
with a stationary squeegee and a moving screen
movable on a long printing table
with a plurality of flat screens mounted on a turntable
for printing on articles having essentially cylindrical surfaces
for printing on conical or frusto-conical surfaces
for printing on essentially spherical surfaces
for printing on curved surfaces not otherwise provided for

title-part.text: with auxiliary equipment, e.g. for drying printed articles
for elongated flat articles, e.g. strips, bands

CPC-specific-text.text: the squeegees or doctors being magnetically attracted

title-part.text: with two or more operative parts

CPC-specific-text.text: for printing from an inked or preprinted foil or band
with means for applying print under heat and pressure, e.g. using heat activable adhesive
with means for applying print under pressure only, e.g. using pressure sensitive adhesive
with means for applying print under heat and pressure, e.g. using heat activable adhesive
with means for applying print under pressure only, e.g. using pressure sensitive adhesive
Arrangements for moving, supporting or positioning the printing foil or band
with means for printing on specific materials or products
for printing on articles with cylindrical surfaces

title-part.text: Printing apparatus or machines of special types or for particular purposes, not otherwise provided for

CPC-specific-text.text: Supports of workpieces in machines for printing on hollow articles
Special types of machines for printing textiles

reference.text: using the screen printing process B41F15/00; printing on knitted fabrics B41F17/38

CPC-specific-text.text: Supports for workpieces; Devices for securing the workpieces to the supports
for printing on curved surfaces not otherwise provided for
Numbering devices for printing on articles other than sheets or webs

title-part.text: for printing books or manifolding sets
for printing on filamentary or elongated articles, or on articles with cylindrical surfaces
on articles of indefinite length, e.g. wires, hoses, tubes, yarns
for printing on rolls of material, the roll serving as impression cylinder, e.g. strip printers
on end or bottom surfaces thereof
on curved surfaces of articles of varying cross-section, e.g. bottles, lamp glasses
on articles of uniform cross-section, e.g. pencils, rulers, resistors
for printing on flat surfaces of polyhedral articles
for printing on curved surfaces of conical or frusto-conical articles
for printing on curved surfaces of essentially spherical, or part-spherical, articles
on articles with surface irregularities, e.g. fruits, nuts
for printing on tablets, pills, or like small articles
Apparatus or machines for carrying out printing operations combined with other operations

CPC-specific-text.text: with means for coating or laminating
with means for applying specific material other than ink
with means for applying metallic, conductive or chargeable material
with selective printing mechanisms, e.g. ink-jet or thermal printers
with means for stamping or cutting out

title-part.text: using intaglio printing formes and wipers
Printing and embossing between a negative and a positive forme after inking and wiping the negative forme
Printing from an ink band treated with colour or "gold"
Devices for conveying sheets through printing apparatus or machines
Combinations of endless conveyors and grippers
Combinations of transfer drums and grippers

CPC-specific-text.text: for reversing sheets, e.g. for perfecting machine

title-part.text: Adjusting leading edges, e.g. front stops
Adjusting lateral edges, e.g. side stops
Means preventing smudging of machine parts or printed articles
Devices for treating the surfaces of sheets, webs, or other articles in connection with printing

CPC-specific-text.text: cleaning devices for sheets or webs

title-part.text: by heat drying, by cooling, by applying powders

CPC-specific-text.text: using a combination of radiation, conduction or convection
Drying sheets, e.g. between two printing stations
by conduction, e.g. using heated rolls
by using gas or fuel burners

title-part.text: Powdering devices, e.g. for preventing set-off
Print finishing devices, e.g. for glossing prints
Devices for pressing sheets or webs against cylinders, e.g. for smoothing purposes
Devices for attaching printing elements or formes to supports

CPC-specific-text.text: Attaching and registering printing formes to supports

title-part.text: for attaching printing elements to flat type-beds
for attaching printing elements to forme cylinders
for attaching printing formes to flat type-beds
for attaching non-deformable curved printing formes to forme cylinders

CPC-specific-text.text: Feeding to or removing from the forme cylinder
moving in the printing plate end substantially rectilinearly
by translatory motion substantially tangential to support surface
by translatory motion substantially perpendicular to support surface
by pivotal or swivelling motion, e.g. by means of a rocking lever
moving in the printing plate end on a curvilinear path, e.g. by winding on a roll
with two semi-cylinders movable relative to each other
details of the printing plate ends
devices for bending the printing plates or the printing plate ends
Devices for filling up the cylinder gap; Devices for removing the filler

title-part.text: for attaching printing formes to intermediate supports, e.g. adapter members
Devices for attaching coverings or make-ready devices
attaching of endless or like continuously-fed coverings

for inking from interior of cylinder

Devices for measuring the pressure between cylinders or bearer rings
